name: Planet Smashers
description:
Current Build:

  • A turn-Based strategy game currently in Beta v1.1
  • Local Multiplayer.
  • Demo stage 1.

Planned (Stuff to do):

  • Single Player.
  • Multiplayer (Online).
  • 4 Player mode (Local and Online).
  • Tournament Mode.
  • Options

Known Bugs:

  • In turn 1, 2nd player's cannon starts the wrong way.
